pkgmetadata.longdescription: ptpdb=====(Still experimental) PDB replacement, build on top of `prompt_toolkit<http://github.com/jonathanslenders/python-prompt-toolkit/>`_ and `ptpython<https://github.com/jonathanslenders/ptpython/>`_.Installation************:: pip install ptpdbUsage*****.. code:: python from ptpdb import set_trace set_trace()See `the official PDB documentation<https://docs.python.org/3/library/pdb.html>`_ to learn how it works.
